original_title: PFL Playoffs 2022 - PFL 8: Macdonald vs. Taylor
overview: The PFL 8 mixed martial arts event for the 2022 season of the Professional Fighters League was held on August 13, 2022, at the Cardiff Motorpoint Arena in Cardiff, Wales. This was the start of the playoffs for the Heavyweight and Welterweight divisions.
title: PFL Playoffs 2022 - PFL 8: Macdonald vs. Taylor
